name: blocklearner
description: A MERN stack application for learning

scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ && node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('backend/public/index.html')) { console.error('Frontend build failed: index.html not found'); process.exit(1); }"
